title: cant login im using comcast
body: says an unexpected error as occurred, 2 days now

replies.body: I haven't seen reports or issues with ISP issues this morning, but have you checked with your ISP support just in case?  The issue might not be with your ISP, though, if it's been happening for this long.  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure nothing is blocking your local network from reaching us.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KawJPXEA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-06T16:07:48.807+0000)
>
> I haven't seen reports or issues with ISP issues this morning, but have you checked with your ISP support just in case?  The issue might not be with your ISP, though, if it's been happening for this long.  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure nothing is blocking your local network from reaching us.

didnt work. i can login to pbe fine. cant login to regular server, tried different computer in a different household still doesnt work

Strange, I'm curious if your router or ISP might be the culprit here.  No worries, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case and grab some logs.  Attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can work with you directly on this.
I've been having the same problem for close to 3 days now. I'm in Budapest Hungary and my ISP is UPC Magyarorsz√°g.
